markdownRemark.html:
A remarkable number of excellent books about Front End Web Development are freely available online, if you know where to look. Here's a collection of those that I've discovered, and deigned to keep in my bookmarks.

Eloquent JavaScript:

http://eloquentjavascript.net/

Learning JavaScript Design Patterns:

https://addyosmani.com/resources/essentialjsdesignpatterns/book/

High Performance Web Sites:

http://stevesouders.com/hpws/

High Performance Browser Networking:

https://hpbn.co/

Designing for Performance:

http://designingforperformance.com/

frontmatter.title: A collection of free, online, Front End Web Development books.
My Front End Web Development setup, with Visual Studio Code.
Link: “How terrible code gets written by perfectly sane people”
